title: Chasing Ghosts - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/28/21
itunes:title: Chasing Ghosts - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/28/21
description:
George Noory and author Marc Hartzman explore his research into the world of ghosts and weird items he has found for sale, as well as the work of Houdini to debunk fake psychic mediums and find real evidence of the afterlife.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
